trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana's next task is not for the squeamish.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any slugs that appear.
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_000<tab>You are truly a sssight for sore eyes, my friend.

TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_001<tab>Our ssscouts recently had the misfortune of spotting a monstrous slug near Dimwold. Their grotesque appearance and corrosive slime─it is enough to make one ssspew.

TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_002<tab>They mussst be dealt with, but I am ashamed to confess the Gatekeepers are ill-sssuited to fight them. The mere sight of them is enough to make mossst convulse. And those who manage to approach are then irreparably scarred by their acidic ssslavering.
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_003<tab>Please, I beg of you─go to Dimwold and rid us of this blight on the land.
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_010<tab>Is it done, then? Is the ssslug no more?
TEXT_BANANA303_03044_ESHANA_000_011<tab>You have my humblessst thanks. If the Gatekeepers should encounter another, you can be certain we will call for you again.
